record.title: NATIONAL MENTORING MONTH

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask consent that the Senate proceed to the consideration of S. Res. 61.

record.chair: The clerk will report the resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, and any statements be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
